Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 2 Complete: HASH Price Display from Figure Markets

- Updated src/app/core.cljs to fetch HASH price from Figure Markets API
- Implemented atom-based state management with three states: loading, success, error
- Added native JavaScript fetch API integration (no external libraries)
- Created responsive UI showing HASH price with large, clear format
- Added error handling with user-friendly messages
- Created test-hash-price.js Playwright test
- All tests passing: HASH price $0.0300 displays correctly
- Updated index.html version to 0.2.0

API Integration:
- Endpoint: https://www.figuremarkets.com/service-hft-exchange/api/v1/markets
- Extracts HASH-USD midMarketPrice from response
- Displays with 4 decimal precision
